channel.title: Client can't connect? PLEASE REPLY
channel.description: Ok so i'm having trouble playing on clients with stuff like D claws and D plate etc. I think those are called 508 servers. I am very noobish with this stuff, I played mopar for years on the web client and just played on servers but now everything needs clients. So heres my problem when ever i try to log into a server like Stabbing scape or chris-scape, It always says error connecting to server, I know the servers arn't down because this has been going on for a couple of days and people say in there posts that there playing it. So can someone help me?

item.title: Client can't connect? PLEASE REPLY
item.dc:creator: @d1215 d1215
item.description:
@d1215 wrote:

How would i fix these? idk how to fix any of these

Read full topic

item.title: Client can't connect? PLEASE REPLY
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Here are some Problems that haveOccure to others:
~the variables arn’t right
~you dont have the right JDK/java version
~you’re No-Ip Conduct Box hasn’t been ticked
~when you edit the run.bat the JDk version isnt the same as the one you have
~you haven’t Portforward yet.

Hope I helped.

Read full topic
